title: Staring at a small screen all day? You’ll probably enjoy this laptop
description: Using the Zenbook 17 Fold at your desk is a pleasure. But you don’t have to be tied to it.

title: Sorry Apple, I still much prefer Sony’s compact flagship
description: High-end specs in a slim form factor are possible after all.

title: I tried bone conduction headphones for running safety, now I won’t go back
description: Open ears, full hearts, can't lose — or something like that.

title: Should you buy the Samsung Galaxy S22 or wait for the Galaxy S23?
description: The Galaxy S22 series is pretty great, but should you invest in it this late in the game?
